ICS-275A, Constraint Networks, Fall 2001
main | announcements | chapters | project

Assignment 1

  1. Read chapters 1 and 2 in the class-notes and provide a short review answering the following questions for each chapter separately.
    • Is the chapter clear? readable?
    • Is the chapter technically difficlult?
    • Enough examples and illustrations?
    • Please provide an overall evaluation
  2. Question 1 in chapter 1.
  3. Question 4, chapter 2.
  4. Question 5 chapter 2.
  5. question 6 chapter 2, but do only one choice for this question.
  6. question 7 chapter 2.
  7. (extra credit) question 8 chapter 2.



School of Information and Computer Science University of California, Irvine, CA 92697-3435 Dr. Rina Dechter dechter at ics.uci.edu
